languages.text: "Ересь должна быть исторгнута из благословенных чертогов. Я объявляю всякого святотатца, алчущего покуситься на реликвию, богохульником третьей категории, заслуживающим немедленной смерти".
"Heresy must be purged from those blessed halls. I declare any desecrator who defiles the relic's power a Category Three blasphemer deserving of immediate execution."
languages.original_text: "Ересь должна быть исторгнута из благословенных чертогов. Я объявляю всякого святотатца, алчущего покуситься на реликвию, богохульником третьей категории, заслуживающим немедленной смерти".

traits.locale_text: "Heresy must be expelled from the blessed chambers. I deem any desecrator who covets the relic's power a category three blasphemer punishable by death on the spot."
"Heresy must be expelled from the blessed chambers. I deem any desecrator who covets the relic's power a category three blasphemer punishable by death on the spot."
"Heresy must be purged from the blessed chambers. I declare any desecrator who defiles a relic's power, a category three blasphemer punishable by death on the spot."
"Heresy must be purged from the blessed chambers. I declare any desecrator who defiles a relic's power, a category three blasphemer punishable by death on the spot."
"Heresy must be purged from those blessed halls. I declare any desecrator who defiles the relic's power a Category Three blasphemer deserving of immediate execution."
"Heresy must be purged from those blessed halls. I declare any desecrator who defiles the relic's power a Category Three blasphemer deserving of immediate execution."

languages.text: "Ketzerei muss aus diesen gesegneten Hallen getilgt werden. Ich erkläre jeden, der die Macht des Relikts entweiht, zum Blasphemisten der Kategorie 3, worauf die sofortige Hinrichtung steht."
languages.original_text: "Heresy must be purged from those blessed halls. I declare any desecrator who defiles the relic's power a Category Three blasphemer deserving of immediate execution."

traits.locale_text: "Ketzerei muss aus den gesegneten Kammern getilgt werden. Ich erkläre jeden, der die Macht eines Relikts entweiht, zum Blasphemisten der Kategorie 3, worauf der sofortige Tod steht."

languages.text: « Il faut purger l'hérésie de ces salles bénies. Je déclare tout profanateur souillant le pouvoir de la relique coupable de blasphème de catégorie 3, un crime passible d'une exécution immédiate. »
languages.original_text: "Heresy must be purged from those blessed halls. I declare any desecrator who defiles the relic's power a Category Three blasphemer deserving of immediate execution."

traits.locale_text: « Il faut purger l'hérésie des salles bénies. Je déclare tout profanateur souillant le pouvoir d'une relique coupable de blasphème de catégorie 3, un crime passible d'une exécution sommaire. »

languages.text: “圣所中的异端分子必须消灭。我宣布，任何亵渎圣物之力的人，都将被判为三级亵渎者，应该当场处决。”
languages.original_text: "Heresy must be purged from those blessed halls. I declare any desecrator who defiles the relic's power a Category Three blasphemer deserving of immediate execution."

traits.locale_text: “圣所中的异端分子必须消灭。我宣布，任何亵渎圣物之力的人，都将被判为三级亵渎者，需当场处决。”

languages.text: 「異端は祝福された部屋から浄化しなければならない。聖遺物の力を汚した冒涜者は、その場で死刑に処すべきカテゴリー3の冒涜者と宣言する」
languages.original_text: "Heresy must be purged from those blessed halls. I declare any desecrator who defiles the relic's power a Category Three blasphemer deserving of immediate execution."

traits.locale_text: 「異端は祝福された部屋から浄化しなければならない。聖遺物の力を汚した冒涜者は、その場で死刑に処すべきカテゴリー3の冒涜者と宣言する」

languages.text: «La herejía debe ser purgada de sus benditos salones. Declaro a todo profanador que mancille el poder de una reliquia blasfemo de categoría tres, merecedor de una ejecución inmediata».
languages.original_text: "Heresy must be purged from those blessed halls. I declare any desecrator who defiles the relic's power a Category Three blasphemer deserving of immediate execution."

traits.locale_text: «La herejía debe ser purgada de las cámaras benditas. Declaro a todo profanador que mancille el poder de una reliquia blasfemo de categoría tres, castigado con la muerte en el acto».

languages.text: "O mukaddes salonların kâfirlikten arındırılması şart. Yadigârın gücünü kirletip ayaklar altına alan herkesi, derhâl infaz edilmeyi hak eden Üçüncü Kategori günahkâr sayarım."
languages.original_text: "Heresy must be purged from those blessed halls. I declare any desecrator who defiles the relic's power a Category Three blasphemer deserving of immediate execution."

traits.locale_text: "O mukaddes salonların kâfirlikten arındırılması şart. Yadigârın gücünü kirletip ayaklar altına alan herkesi, derhâl infaz edilmeyi hak eden Üçüncü Kategori günahkâr sayarım."
